thread.title: Trip of the week: Oregon’s Rogue River Rafting
thread.title_full: Trip of the week: Oregon’s Rogue River Rafting

title: Trip of the week: Oregon’s Rogue River Rafting
text:
Sunday August 9, 2015 5:00 AM 
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox. 
Oregon’s Rogue River Rafting 
WESTERN RIVER EXPEDITIONS, 1-866-904-1160, www.westernriver.com 
THE TRIP: This three- or four-day rafting trip on a designated Wild and Scenic section of the Rogue River includes runs through Class II-IV rapids and stays at comfortable riverside lodges. (Guests will hike around the Class V Ranie Falls.) 
Guests will also enjoy regional craft beers and wines followed by family-style dinners. The river, though near Medford, runs through wild regions in which the river is the only “road.” 
The package includes rafting, hiking, lodging and all meals. 
THE COST: from $955 per adult double occupancy, $795 for youth ages 5 to 17 
@DispatchTravel
